title: Decoupage, ca. 1700
inscribed: Inscription below central picture "QUI ME NEGLIGE ME PERT".
dimensions: Central panel: 11 x 9 cm (4 5/16 x 3 9/16 in.)
description: Small rectangular painting on vellum, showing an orange tree in a tub set in a flowered landscape, is imposed on a silhouette cut-out showing curtains, doves, rampant lions and a crown.  The whole attached to a pink paper ground with escolloped edges.  Gilt paper and paint outline the various members of the cut-out.

tombstone.epitaph:
Decoupage, ca. 1700.
ca. 1700. Scissor-cut vellum, oil. Gift of Richard C. Greenleaf. 1956-7-2.
